fields.Title of Presentation: The Futre of Conservation in a Crowded West
fields.Description/Abstract: T<br>his year’s storytelling evening’s conversation and panel will focus on the importance of both private<br>and public lands, the critical role of agriculture in conservation and obstacles that landowners face<br>in stewarding these landscapes. Panelists will dive into the world of innovative tools and practices<br>being used by landowners and producers to benefit the habitat they steward and the humans and wildlife<br>that depend on it. The panel will also highlight the idea of stewardship beyond boundaries: the need for<br>all of us - landowners, sportsmen, recreationalists, ranchers, rural and urban residents - to look beyond the<br>boundaries of our land or immediate self-interests. The future of the West is dependent on building healthy<br>landscapes that work for us all.
